body.p: The difference in pH between lemon juice and sea water is six orders of magnitude. Written out another way, that represents what difference in proton concentration?

response.name: 6 fold
response.feedback: Incorrect. "Six-fold" means six times higher. Try again.

response.name: 1 x 106
response.feedback: Correct. 1 x 106 = 1,000,000 times higher, or a one million-fold difference in proton concentration.
Incorrect. A 0.06 difference would signify a percentage difference, not a magnitude difference. Try again.

part.hint: Refer to the scale and count the orders of magnitude between pH 2 and pH 8.
